text: Bakdash (Arabic: بَكْدَاش) is an ice cream parlor in Damascus, Syria. It is famous in the Arab world for Booza, a Syrian ice cream. It was founded in 1895 and a second location was opened in Jordan in 2013. ==References== == Other websites == * United in the Joy of Ice Cream in "backpackfoodie" site Category:Damascus Category:Shops Category:Mastic ice creams
title: Bakdash
